DataElement.preferredName: Electronic Health Record Review Occurrence Study Protocol Timepoint Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The term that represents an electronic health record review occurrence as it relates to a study protocol timepoint category.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Checking and assessing the data present in an electronic health record._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Checking and assessing the data present in an electronic health record.

Concepts.definition: Checking and assessing the data present in an electronic health record.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The formal plan of an experiment or research activity, including the objective, rationale, design, materials and methods for the conduct of the study; intervention description, and method of data analysis._A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event._A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.
